definition: to regard as/to figure/to calculate/to compute

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: The paper deals with the convegence of Riesz operators for Jacobi expansions.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了雅可比展开的黎斯算子的若干逼近性质。

sentences.english: Dead-zone operator is adopted in the adaptive algorithm, which improves the robustness of the algorithm.
sentences.chinese: 自适应算法中采用了死区算子，增强了算法的鲁棒性。

sentences.english: By loading doubting operator D on a proposition, we obtain a doubting proposition.
sentences.chinese: 将怀疑算子D加于命题之上就构成怀疑命题。

sentences.english: In the end we prove that idempotent operator is similar to its adjoint.
sentences.chinese: 最后还证明了幂等算子和它的伴随是相似的。

sentences.english: Under certain conditions, the operator of anomaly separation is simply an upward continuation operator.
sentences.chinese: 在一定条件下，异常划分算子就是向上延拓算子。

sentences.english: Under certain conditions, the operator of anomaly separation is simply an upward continuation operator.
sentences.chinese: 在一定条件下，异常划分算子就是向上延拓算子。

sentences.english: Operator theory, operator algebras, and applications.
sentences.chinese: 算子理论，算子代数及其应用。

sentences.english: Operator theory, operator algebras, and applications.
sentences.chinese: 算子理论，算子代数及其应用。

sentences.english: In this paper, introduced the Differentiator Series Method to solve the five-dimensional wave equation problem.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍解五维波动问题的微分算子级数法。

sentences.english: It is also shown that integral kernel operators can be expressedin terms of gradient and divergent operators.
sentences.chinese: 也证明了积分核算子可用梯度与散度算子表出。

sentences.english: The generalized Riesz summability operators of Laplace series are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 引进了拉普拉斯级数的广义黎斯可和算子。

sentences.english: It is also shown that integral kernel operators can be expressedin terms of gradient and pergent operators.
sentences.chinese: 也证明了积分核算子可用梯度与散度算子表出。

sentences.english: The recurrent neural network model based on projective operator is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了一种基于投影算子的神经网络模型。

sentences.english: In this paper, the authors study the singular and fractional integrals with variable kernel.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了带有变量核的奇异积分与分数次积分算子。

sentences.english: Lie algebras of derivations of n-differential operator algebra.
sentences.chinese: 元微分算子代数的导子李代数结构。

sentences.english: In this paper, the applications of the local resolvent method in the operator theory are studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究局部预解式方法在算子理论中的应用。

definition: Bayes (name)/Thomas Bayes (1702-1761), English mathematician and theologian
